review: Excellent device!  I own a Roku 2 and Roku 3 and the Fire TV has become my main device.  It is much faster than either of the Roku's that I own.  I especially like how the Photo's and Videos are integrated into the menu system if you are a Prime member and load the Amazon cloud drive app.  It is nice to be able to view all the photos and videos on the big screen.  The voice search is helpful but does only work with Amazon apps etc...  Love this device.
